data.message: Hey slim shady, i'm a big fan, not like that crazy stan, see what i did there, i got a black hair, i don't think you might care, all i need is a reply, it would be sweeter than an apple pie, don't even ask why, and no, that's not a lie, i'm just trying to grab your attention, free styling for a good intention or maybe first and last impression. I heard it's easier for you to free style, your music made me smile, can you reply one with the same type? I'd appreciate that mr. Mathers, you're one great rapper.
